1.content: Little Sister, Older sister, Mother, or Combo?
1.title: Pick one!

11.content:
The day starts off like any other day. You're in your bed thinking about if you really wanna get out today. Before you can make up your mind your little sister Bailey walks in, but she looks like she has something planned.
"Good morning!" she says
"What do you want bailey?"
"I wanted to see if you'd play a game with me?"
"You're 15 aren't you a little to old for games?"
Come on please!" she begs
"Fine okay if you'll leave me alone. Whats the game?"
She smiles "Welllllll~ I want to have a farting contest."
"Okay?" you say confused
"But the loser has to do what ever the winner wants for a week!" She replys
"Okay whatever if you'll leave me alone I don't care" you say tiredly
"Okay~ lets get started" She says as she walks to your bed
11.title: The Game

info.brief_description: Some one in your family wants to have some fun with you.
